venue.address_1: Memorial Union Bldg, University of New Hampshire, 83 Main St, Durham, NH 03824
venue.name: Memorial Union Bldg, University of New Hampshire, 83 Main St, Durham, NH 03824

item.description:
Gov. Gary Johnson will speak in The Granite State Room in the Memorial Union Building at the University of New Hampshire on Wednesday, September 19th at 12 pm EDT.


The event is free and open to the public, but if you want a front row reserved seat there are a limited number of tickets available here for a $50 donation: https://donate.garyjohnson2012.com/?refcode=UNH

Parking: Park in Lot C which is located on Mill Rd off of Main St. Cost is $1/hr
item.name: Gov Gary Johnson Speech at UNH
